part_type_alpha1: This function is used to set a particle type to have a single alpha value (transparency) for the total duration of the lifetime of each individual particle, and this can be from 0 (transparent) to 1 (opaque).
The index of the particle type to change.
The above code will set all particles created of the particle type indexed in the global variable "Snow_Part" to have an alpha value of 0.5 (semi-transparent).
